ds_grid_set_region: This function can be used to set a rectangular region of a given grid to a specified value (which can be either a real or a string) as illustrated by the image shown below:
ds_grid_set_region(index, x1, y1, x2, y2, val);
The x position of the left of the region in the grid.
The y position of the top of the region in the grid.
The x position of the right of the region in the grid.
The y position of the bottom of the region in the grid.
The value to set the region cells to.
This would set all cells within the region of the grid indexed in the variable "grid" from (5,5) to (10,10) to 99.
